00025 // be sure that this file not accessed directly
00026 if (basename($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']) == basename(__FILE__)) {
00027     die();
00028 }

00030 // be sure that magic quote is off
00031 @ini_set('magic_quotes_gpc', false);
00032 @ini_set('magic_quotes_runtime', false);
00033 @ini_set('magic_quotes_sybase', false);
00034 // force disabling magic quotes
00035 if (get_magic_quotes_gpc()) {
00036     function stripslashes_deep($value)
00037     {
00038         $value = is_array($value)?array_map('stripslashes_deep', $value):stripslashes($value);
00039         return $value;
00040     }
00041 
00042     $_POST = array_map('stripslashes_deep', $_POST);
00043     $_GET = array_map('stripslashes_deep', $_GET);
00044     $_COOKIE = array_map('stripslashes_deep', $_COOKIE);
00045     $_REQUEST = array_map('stripslashes_deep', $_REQUEST);
00046 }
00047 // turn off all error messages for security reason
00048 @ini_set('display_errors', true);

00146 // we prefer to use mysqli extensions if its available
00147 if (extension_loaded('mysqli')) {
00148     /* MYSQLI */
00149     $dbs = @new mysqli(DB_HOST, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, DB_NAME, DB_PORT);
00150     if (mysqli_connect_error()) {
00151         die('<div style="border: 1px dotted #FF0000; color: #FF0000; padding: 5px;">Error Connecting to Database. Please check your configuration</div>');
00152     }
00153 } else {
00154     /* MYSQL */
00155     // require the simbio mysql class
00156     include SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/mysql/simbio_mysql.inc.php';
00157     // make a new connection object that will be used by all applications
00158     $dbs = @new simbio_mysql(DB_HOST, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, DB_NAME, DB_PORT);
00159 }

00207 /* BARCODE config */
00208 // encoding
00209 /*
00210 EAN     8 or 13 EAN-Code
00211 UPC     12-digit EAN
00212 ISBN    isbn numbers (still EAN-13)
00213 39      code 39
00214 128     code 128
00215 128C    code 128 (compact form for digits)
00216 128B    code 128, full printable ascii
00217 I25     interleaved 2 of 5
00218 128RAW  Raw code 128
00219 CBR     Codabars
00220 MSI     MSI
00221 PLS     Plesseys
00222 93      code 93
00223 */

00301 // load global settings from database. Uncomment below lines if you dont want to load it
00302 utility::loadSettings($dbs);
00303 // check for user language selection if we are not in admin areas
00304 if (stripos($_SERVER['PHP_SELF'], '/admin') === false) {
00305     if (isset($_GET['select_lang'])) {
00306         $select_lang = trim(strip_tags($_GET['select_lang']));
00307         // delete previous language cookie
00308         if (isset($_COOKIE['select_lang'])) {
00309             @setcookie('select_lang', $select_lang, time()-14400, SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR);
00310         }
00311         // create language cookie
00312         @setcookie('select_lang', $select_lang, time()+14400, SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR);
00313         $sysconf['default_lang'] = $select_lang;
00314     } else if (isset($_COOKIE['select_lang'])) {
00315         $sysconf['default_lang'] = trim(strip_tags($_COOKIE['select_lang']));
00316     }
00317 }
00318 // Apply language settings
00319 require LANGUAGES_BASE_DIR.'localisation.php';
